p: According to the authors, L177: ‘There were too few native plants with lesions. With that being said, how can the authors speculate the following at Line 268: ‘These results suggest that disease caused by Bipolaris may alter the community composition of native species. This claim seems farfetched and unsupported, since ‘there were too few native plants with lesions. The authors report disease incidence at Line 209 -213, and then provide an explanation that is not intuitive. The results are reported as ‘disease incidence’, but then authors explain disease severity. Disease incidence is should be per plant/individual. Disease severity should be per leaves.
